title: Is Binance Losing Grip? Experts Weigh In on Abu Dhabi License Exit!
description:
Binance has reportedly announced the withdrawal of a license application that allowed the platform to operate a collective investment fund in Abu Dhabi amidst increasing regulatory challenges. According to reports, on November 7, BV Investment Management, Binance’s unit in the United Arab Emirates (UAE), dropped its application as part of reassessing its global structure. Abu […]

title: PeckShield Alerts Web3 Community About Smart Contract Vulnerability
description:
PeckShield Inc., a prominent blockchain security company, recently highlighted a critical vulnerability affecting popular smart contracts in a post on X (formerly Twitter). This alarming disclosure has galvanized the Web3 community into action, emphasizing the necessity for heightened security measures and proactive responses in the blockchain ecosystem.
